answers.answer: Have you been swollen before? Or was it just sudden
Yea I have but it would qo away like the same day ..
At night my hands would qet really really swollen Im not able to close it ..

Sounds like preeclampsia if it's mixed with other issues like blurred vision, seeing spots, protein in urine or high blood pressure. Not much you can do once you're are already swollen, but my preeclampsia specialist has me on a no salt, caffeine, carbonated, or citrus drinks diet and it's been helping a lot to prevent it.

Im qotten blurrinq vision bfore and dizziness ... omq now Im worried .. but Ive qotten good pressure  .. how would my Dr would kno if I have this ? He knows Ive qotten dizzy bfore and swollen feet but he hasnt said its preeclamsia .. i took some blood test and i see the results tomorrow

They take your urine every visit to see if their is protein in your urine im pretty sure your doc is keeping an eye on everything if your blood pressure is good im sure your fine it's the end of your pregnancy your bound to get some swelling

Yea. If your dr hasn't mentioned having protein in your urine and having good bp then that's always a good sign. I see a specialist and do 24-hr urine collections a lot because I have super high protein but good bp. So they're keeping an eye on me just in case.

question: Uqh ! My feet & hands are swollen is there anythin I can do so it can qo away ? I feel like my hands are about to pop .. so frustrated .. Im due in 9 days cant wait to see my bby qurl ..
title: swollen !
